sentences.en: Didn't you know I was joking, you sap?
sentences.cn: 你难道不知道我是在开玩笑 吗 ?傻瓜.

sentences.en: He warned against a fake detente that would sap resistance to expansionism.
sentences.cn: 他警告我们不要上假缓和的当,以免放松对扩张主义的斗争.

sentences.en: I was afraid the sickness had sapped my strength.
sentences.cn: 恐怕这场病已经消耗了我的力气。

sentences.en: It is best to coppice the trees in the winter before the sap rises.
sentences.cn: 最好在冬天树汁增多之前修剪这些树。

sentences.en: Little insects were often unlucky and got stuck in this sap.
sentences.cn: 一些小昆虫常常不幸粘到了松脂里.

sentences.en: Maple sugar is made from the sap of maple trees.
sentences.cn: 枫糖是由枫树的树液制成的.

sentences.en: Maple syrup is made from sap extracted from the sugar maple tree.
sentences.cn: 槭糖浆是用糖槭树中提取的树液制成的。

sentences.en: Sap passes right through the aphides'bodies, only getting a little thicker and sweeter.
sentences.cn: 汁液直接流过蚜虫的身体, 结果只是变得更稠、更甜.

sentences.en: Some of those same trees produce a peculiar sap each spring.
sentences.cn: 有些这样的树每年春天都产生出一种独特的汁液.

sentences.en: The leaves, bark and sap are also common ingredients of local herbal remedies.
sentences.cn: 树叶、树皮和树汁也是当地草药的常用药材。

sentences.en: The sap of this plant blisters the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种植物的汁液会使皮肤起水疱。

sentences.en: The world's whole sap is sunk.
These bugs drink much sap every day.
sentences.cn: 这些虫子每天吸食许多树液.

sentences.en: They tapped the sugar maples when the sap began to flow.
sentences.cn: 当糖枫树的树液开始向外流淌时,他们便切割这些枫树皮.

sentences.en: Too many irons in the fire can sap your energy and prevent you from seeing which path to take.
sentences.cn: 同时做太多事会使你精力衰竭，让你不知道该做哪件事。

sentences.en: You don't know what a sap she is.

words.tran_cn: 枯萎的；无生气的；无价值的
精力充沛的；树液多的；愚笨的
[植]树液；精力，元气；活力；[军]坑道
使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

trans.tran_cn: 精力，元气，树液，活力，坑道
trans.tran_en: the watery substance that carries food through a plant

trans.tran_cn: 使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础
trans.tran_en: to make something weaker or destroy it, especially someone’s strength or their determination to do something
to make something weaker or destroy it, especially someone’s strength or their determination to do something

trans.tran_cn: 使衰竭，使伤元气，挖掘使倒塌
trans.tran_en: If something saps your strength or confidence, it gradually weakens or destroys it
